O

org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.pcsc - package org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.pcsc
PCSC ProxyReader plugin

P

PCSC_PROTOCOL_SETTING - Static variable in class org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.pcsc.PcscProtocolSetting
 
PcscPlugin - Interface in org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.pcsc
The PcscPlugin interface provides the public elements used to manage the PC/SC plugin.
It defines in particular the type of object produced by the PcscPluginFactory.
PcscPluginConstants - Class in org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.pcsc
This class defines the constants useful for setting up the PC/SC plugin.
The current keys concern the plugin name itself and the possibility to define a pattern (regex) for recognition of a player's transmission type from its name.
These elements could possibly be used by the readers while calling getTransmissionMode if this mode has not been defined otherwise.
PcscPluginFactory - Class in org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.pcsc
Builds a PcscPlugin
PcscPluginFactory() - Constructor for class org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.pcsc.PcscPluginFactory
 
PcscProtocolSetting - Class in org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.pcsc
This class contains all the parameters to identify the communication protocols supported by PC/SC readers.
PcscReaderConstants - Class in org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.pcsc
This class defines the constants useful for the configuration of the PC/SC readers.
These constants are strings defining the keys (suffix _KEY) and values (suffix _VAL) to be used with the setParameter method.
PLUGIN_NAME - Static variable in class org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.pcsc.PcscPluginConstants
The plugin name
PROTOCOL_KEY - Static variable in class org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.pcsc.PcscReaderConstants
key to set the PC/SC protocol parameter
PROTOCOL_VAL_T0 - Static variable in class org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.pcsc.PcscReaderConstants
PC/SC protocol T=0
PROTOCOL_VAL_T1 - Static variable in class org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.pcsc.PcscReaderConstants
PC/SC protocol T=1
PROTOCOL_VAL_T_CL - Static variable in class org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.pcsc.PcscReaderConstants
PC/SC protocol T=CL
PROTOCOL_VAL_TX - Static variable in class org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.pcsc.PcscReaderConstants
PC/SC protocol '*'

T

TRANSMISSION_MODE_KEY - Static variable in class org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.pcsc.PcscReaderConstants
